entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:09 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -40.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugluktuk Airport 07:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -40.1°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -44
Dewpoint: -44.0°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Clear. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
